name: Steely Wheels - tvOS App
description:
🚔 Steely Wheels is a project I designed during a 36-hour designathon, Palette ‘20. Assigned problem statement - Design a TV OS for an automobile seller to help criminals on the run.


🏆 I won third place for this project! So I fixed up its file structure for fellow tinkerers.


⚡️ Inside: 15 screens + pitch deck + wireframes + tvOS UI kit and more


☕️ If you like this project, buy me a coffee :)
